title: 📊 Market Intel — Mon Feb 16, 2026 10:00 AM ET
content:
# 📊 Market Intel — Mon Feb 16, 2026 10:00 AM ET

**Top Headlines: US 2025 Jobs Revised Down 1M+ | Bitcoin Crashes to $68K | RIVN Surges 27% | NBA All-Star Weekend | Qwen3.5 Multimodal AI Drops**

---

## 🔥 Top Trending

- **US 2025 jobs numbers revised down by over 1 million** — Massive revision rattling markets; WSB's #1 post with 23K upvotes. Macro bears vindicated.
- **Bitcoin plunges to $68,000** — Crypto market "drowns in red." Bloomberg's Mike McGlone warns BTC could hit $10K if US recession materializes. Strategy (fka MicroStrategy) says it can survive BTC at $8K.
- **RIVN +27%** — Rivian surges on heavy volume (128M shares vs 38M avg). One of the biggest movers on the board.
- **PINS -17%** — Pinterest cratering after earnings miss, heaviest volume in months.
- **DKNG -14%** — DraftKings getting hammered, down to $21.76.

---

## 📈 Stock Movers

| Ticker | Move | Notes |
|--------|------|-------|
| **RIVN** | +26.6% ($17.73) | 128M volume, 3x avg — massive EV rally |
| **FSLY** | +13.8% ($18.26) | Fastly surging, 8x avg volume |
| **RIG** | +8.5% ($6.54) | Transocean up on energy momentum |
| **PLUG** | +3.9% ($1.89) | Green energy bounce |
| **F** | +2.0% ($14.12) | Ford steady, high volume |
| **INTC** | +0.7% ($46.79) | Intel holding gains, +71% 52-wk |
| **PINS** | -16.8% ($15.42) | Pinterest crushed post-earnings |
| **DKNG** | -13.5% ($21.76) | DraftKings selloff |
| **NVDA** | -2.2% ($182.78) | Nvidia pulling back, still $4.45T market cap |
| **AAPL** | -2.3% ($255.78) | Apple slipping |
| **AMZN** | -0.4% ($198.79) | Amazon flat |
| **TSLA** | +0.1% ($417.44) | Tesla flat, volume below avg |
| **ONDS** | +3.8% ($9.31) | Ondas quietly up +464% on 52-wk |

**Markets closed today (Presidents' Day)** — these are Friday close prices. Watch for gap moves Tuesday.

---

## 💰 Crypto & Digital Assets

- **BTC at ~$68,000** — Fell hard over the weekend. McGlone (Bloomberg) warns of potential $10K if recession hits. Links to record US market cap-to-GDP, low vol, rising gold.
- **ETH rebounding toward $2,000** — After $540M sell wave, ether outperforming broader crypto
- **Strategy (MSTR)** says it can survive BTC dropping to $8K, will "equitize" its ~$6B debt
- **Harvard cuts BTC exposure 20%, adds new ETH position** — Institutional rotation from BTC → ETH
- **Metaplanet** operating profit to rise 81% in 2026 despite $650M non-cash BTC loss
- **Nexo re-enters US market** via Bakkt partnership — yield accounts, credit lines, exchange
- **OKX gets EU payments license** in Malta ahead of March 2026 regs
- **Russia's daily crypto turnover: $650M+** — pushing for spring legislation
- **CZ (Binance)** echoes Consensus panelists: lack of privacy blocking crypto adoption
- **Crypto Week Ahead:** Hive & Riot earnings + Fed rate-decision minutes

---

## 🚀 Tesla / SpaceX / Elon

- **TSLA flat at $417.44** — quiet day, volume below average
- P/E ratio at 386x — still elevated
- 52-wk range: $214–$499
- No major SpaceX launch news today

---

## 💻 Hacker News / Tech

- **"I'm joining OpenAI"** by steipete — 1,226 points, 907 comments. Biggest HN story of the day.
- **Qwen3.5: Native Multimodal Agents** — Alibaba's new AI model drops, 139 points. Multimodal agent capabilities.
- **"Anthropic tries to hide Claude's AI actions. Devs hate it"** — The Register piece, 137 points, 79 comments. AI transparency debate heating up.
- **"Expensively Quadratic: The LLM Agent Cost Curve"** — 76 points. LLM agent costs growing quadratically, cost optimization discussion.
- **UK Ministry of Justice orders deletion of largest court reporting database** — 112 points, 70 comments. Legal/tech controversy.
- **Magnus Carlsen wins Freestyle (Chess960) World Championship** — 324 points
- **Modern CSS Code Snippets** — 573 points, viral dev resource
- **Ghidra by NSA** trending again — reverse engineering tool
- **"Should I walk or drive 50m to the car wash?"** — 909 points, 581 comments, viral humor post

---

## 🦍 Reddit / WSB

- **#1 Hot Post: "US 2025 jobs numbers revised down by over 1 million"** — 23,010 upvotes, sourced from Kobeissi Letter on X. Massive macro signal.
- Daily Discussion Thread active with 952 comments
- **Presidents' Day = markets closed** — expect Tuesday gap plays
- Sentiment: bearish/cautious on macro after jobs revision
- r/stocks: Portfolio rebalancing discussion, Q4 earnings season wind-down
- r/cryptocurrency: Privacy coins debate, Concordium AMA on compliant privacy

---

## 🏈 Sports & Betting

- **NBA All-Star Weekend (San Francisco)** — Round Robin format:
  - World 35, Team Stars 37 (OT)
  - Team Stars 40, Team Stripes 42
  - World 45, Team Stripes 48
  - **Championship: Team Stars 47, Team Stripes 21**
- Kendrick Perkins: "Adam Silver has found the recipe for the All-Star Game"
- Jaylen Brown "offended" by Beverly Hills' statement about event shutdown — drama
- New All-Star format getting praise
- **Presidents' Day = light sports card** — no major lines to track

---

## 💎 Commodities & Macro

- **Jobs revision is THE story** — 2025 jobs overstated by 1M+, fueling recession fears
- **Gold leading** as risk-off trade — McGlone cites rising gold as BTC warning signal
- **Fed minutes due this week** — rate decision context critical after jobs revision
- Record US market cap-to-GDP ratio flagged as risk indicator
- **Silicon Valley Bank**: "This is crypto's year of integration" — bank-led stablecoins, tokenized T-bills, AI wallets moving from pilot to production

---

## 🌍 What X Is Talking About

- **Kobeissi Letter** viral post on 1M+ jobs revision — most shared finance post of the weekend
- BTC crash discourse dominating FinTwit
- Privacy in crypto trending after CZ + Consensus panel commentary
- NBA All-Star content flooding timelines
- AI model releases (Qwen3.5) sparking agent discourse

---

*Sources: Yahoo Finance, CoinDesk, Hacker News, Reddit (WSB/stocks/cryptocurrency), ESPN, X/Twitter*
*Next scan: ~12:00 PM ET*
